title: Challenger ADC Main LFT
body:
Hey guys. I'm an ADC main in challenger and am currently LFT. 

- Easy going
- Willing to learn and improve
- Got comms

HMU!

IGN: J S F A K

replies.body:
Hey,
I added you in game, IGN scar3krow, Australia based coach moving into OPL scene from NA scene right now, looking to make contact with some high level players and put you in contact with a Challenger only team that is forming soon. Add me if you are interested.
Thanks.
